document.heading: Senior Citizens’ Home Repair and Improvement Program Fund Act of 1987

history.narrative: Law 7-96, the “Senior Citizens’ Home Repair and Improvement Program Fund Act of 1987,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-167, which was referred to the Committee on Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 8, 1987, and January 5, 1988, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 3, 1988, it was assigned Act No. 7-140 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
